1.name: Home
1.description: Validation of the service, to verify that the service is active and running correctly.

2.name: Upload_file
2.description:
Upload or Update a file into Qdrant vector database with the last id, saving the embeddings and the payload.  
 **If you want to upload a file, please do not include id**, 
  **If you want update a file, please include correct id**

3.name: Search
3.description: create an answer to the search request of user, you can include directly your search in the prompt field. Just include a prompt with max 100 charactes

4.name: Generate Token
4.description: Permite realizar solicitud de token bajo autenticación, enviando usuario **'username'** y contraseña **'password'**
